title: Crypto activities legalized in Turkmenistan
description:
28 November 2025 22:23 (UTC+04:00)

By Alimat Aliyeva

President of Turkmenistan Serdar Berdimuhamedov has signed a law legalizing cryptocurrency mining and establishing the framework for crypto exchanges in the country. Under the new legislation, all miners are required to register with the Central...

title: Crypto News: New Country Joins The Fray; Turkmenistan Moves To Legalize Crypto Trading Next Year
description:
Turkmenistan will legalise crypto trading and mining under strict state control in 2025, enforcing licensing, KYC, AML, and supervision.
